listing.listing_description: Stunning views and an exclusive location make Hesperides House a Caribbean idyll. This oceanfront Turks and Caicos vacation rental was named for the nymphs of sunset, who tended a beautiful garden, and will remind you of that Greek myth with its lush tropical landscaping and the crystal clear water that laps at the yard. Invite up to ten friends or family members to this five-bedroom luxury property for an unforgettable beach holiday.The plans for this gorgeous contemporary home, drawn up by acclaimed Coast Architects, call for 4,000 square feet of indoor living space—and an equal amount outdoors. Take in views across Caicos Bank to West Harbour Point and Frenchman’s Creek Nature Preserve from the infinity pool, a pergola-covered daybed, the loungers on the pool terrace or a row of Adirondack chairs on a deck closer to the water. Rinse off in the al-fresco shower, heat up the barbecue and enjoy an evening around the outdoor dining table and firepit.Hesperides House is laid out in three distinct sections, giving each one a private feel. The main pavilion features an L-shaped great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen under an airy vaulted ceiling. A separate library with a home theater system is a more intimate space for watching TV or listening to the Sonos sound system.Each of the five bedrooms has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning, and three of the five have outdoor furniture and open directly to the pool terrace. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are sleek and contemporary, with clean-lined furniture, blond-wood accents and bedding in shades of white and turquoise that echo the brilliant colors of the sea outside.The villa is tucked behind the gates of the exclusive Silly Creek Estates on the southwestern shore of Providenciales. Take a few steps beyond the patio to swim, snorkel or kayak right in front of the villa, or bring young children to the wading beach on Silly Creek in back of the house. The location at the edge of Chalk Sound National Park also puts you close to miles of deserted shoreline and beaches, perfect for exploring by paddleboard or taking a honeymoon-style stroll. There are several other world-class beaches within a short drive, including Taylor Bay and Sapodilla Bay, and plenty of dining options as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let your cares slip away at Villa Tranquilidad. Part of the exclusive Puerto Los Cabos community, the beachfront villa puts you close to sun and sand, award-winning golf, the quaint center of San Jose del Cabo and the famous nightlife of Cabo San Lucas. Refined modern architecture, beautifully appointed outdoor living spaces and seven suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate casita, provide ample room and opportunity to find inner peace.Fold-away glass walls and shady palapas blur the line between indoors and out, creating breezy, inviting living spaces perfect for entertaining and relaxing alike. The wide terrace, which stretches the width of the villa, is bookended by lounging and dining areas, with a row of lounge chairs in between. The only thing between you and the beach is the heated infinity pool and jetted tub. In the evenings, a gas barbecue and firepit tempt you to stay outside past sunset, and an outdoor sound system and television mean there’s hardly any need to go indoors—though if you do, there’s a wet bar, home theater and fitness room.With its courtyard layout, tiled roof, earth tones and exposed-beam ceilings, Villa Tranquilidad nods to traditional Mexican style. Its clean-lined rooms and furnishings, however, are all modern. Walls and floors in the same elegant taupe form a serene backdrop for contemporary pieces like a gray sectional or long dark-wood dining table and chairs. Paneled cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen keep to the restrained palette, but a blue tile backsplash is a more exuberant touch.There are six bedrooms in the main house at Villa Tranquilidad—four downstairs and two upstairs–and one in each of the casita's. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and access to a terrace or balcony. On the main house’s lower level, there are two master suites with king beds, jetted tubs and ocean views, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. Upstairs, you’ll find two additional suites with king beds, jetted tubs and ocean views. Not only is the villa located on Puerto Los Cabos Beach, it affords guests access to the pool, spa, fitness center and bar at Puerto Los Cabos Beach Club. If you’d like to explore other beaches in the area, make the drive to Tabasco Beach or Médano Beach, both about 39.9 km away. Don’t miss towns and attractions like San Jose del Cabo, 9.9 km away, Cabo San Lucas, 40.5 km away, Land’s End, 41.7 km away, or Cabo del Sol, 42.7 km away. Active guests can play tennis at Canchas de Tenis, 8.7 km away, or Tennis Club Pedregal, 41.7 km away, or golf at Cabo Real Golf Club, 21.7 km away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 20.5 km drive from Villa Tranquilidad to Los Cabos International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Villa Calafia del Mar is an extraordinary Los Cabos home outside San José del Cabo, situated in the El Encanto de la Laguna residential community on the breathtaking East Cape. Perched on a slope within easy walking distance of East Cape Beach, the colonial-style home enjoys panoramic views of the Sea of Cortez. Its 3,500 square feet of living space is superbly appointed with resort-style amenities, including a hot tub, infinity pool with swim-up bar, and both indoor and alfresco kitchens and dining areas. Three king bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunk room form an ideal haven for families and destination wedding guests.Expansive outdoor living areas invite you to savor the open-air delights of this Mexican jewel. Soothe your muscles in the voluminous hot tub, and sip delicious drinks from the palapa bar while bathing in the pool. Sunbathe on plentiful loungers or drift into a sweet siesta in the hammock. Gather for alfresco meals and cocktails on the veranda, and stay toasty by the fire pit under the scintillating stars.The living room is spacious and cozy, with comfortable sofas facing a flat-screen TV beneath lovely peaked ceilings with charming wood beams. Gourmet enthusiasts will adore the villa's kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serving multiple sea-view dining areas. Wide glass doors inhale the sea-kissed breeze into the home. A poker table, Apple TV, and Sonos sound system provide ample entertainment.Each of the three king suites enjoys ocean views. Two open to the terrace and one opens to a lovely balcony. All three are superbly appointed for couples or individual travelers, including deluxe ensuite bathrooms. The children's suite overlooks the garden and includes a two-person bunk bed and private ensuite bathroom.Villa Calafia del Mar balances privileged privacy and convenient location in one of Baja California's most beautiful settings. Walk about 650 meters to East Cape Beach, or play a round at nearby Puerto de Los Cabos Golf Course, featuring nine holes designed by Jack Nicklaus and nine by Greg Norman. Venture about twelve kilometers to the bohemian-chic San José del Cabo, with its enchanting colonial buildings and superb art galleries.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Adam & Eve is a palatial luxury villa in the Leeward Settlement on the beautiful island of Providenciales in Turks and Caicos. With waterfront property along a swimmable canal, the four-bedroom vacation rental features outstanding outdoor and indoor spaces for relaxing and entertaining among family and friends, while its proximity to Grace Bay places you in one of the finest locations on this paradisal island.Surrounded by lush tropical flora, the villa's unique and spectacular design includes ground-floor and upper-floor verandas overlooking the expansive pool terrace. Enjoy long, luxurious days in the Caribbean sun, bathing in the swimming pool, steeping your body in the hot tub, soaking in the rays on elegant loungers, and sipping cocktails in the cool, covered lounge. In the afternoon, fire up the grill for some delicious barbeque and relish a lovely meal together around the alfresco table.Multiple sets of French doors open from the pool terrace veranda to the open-plan interior. The lovely living lounge is perfect for evenings by the TV, while the dining table overlooking the pool welcomes you for festive meals together. The light-filled kitchen is fully equipped and includes a breakfast bar for four. The villa's understated but exquisite décor includes subtle but evocative touches of vibrant color and decorative detail that accentuate the pervasive natural beauty of Providenciales.The villa's bedrooms are enchanting and cozy sanctuaries for couples and guests. The stunning master bedroom features a king bed beneath high, vaulted ceilings, access to the terrace and garden, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. The primary guest room also has a king bed and terrace access, and shares a bathroom with bedroom four, which has two twin beds. Bedroom three, with queen bed, also opens to the terrace and has an ensuite bathroom.Beyond your private estate, you're wonderfully situated for enjoying this extraordinary Caribbean island. Grace Bay, Emerald Beach, and Pelican Beach are all within a five-minute drive from your door, while Provo Golf Club, featuring one of the premier courses in the Caribbean, is also a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Located in the exclusive development of Punta Ballena, home to the famous Auberge Esperanza Resort, Villa Tranquila is a spacious and private vacation rental just a ten minute walk from the beach. Showcasing colonial design and loaded with perks, this stunning vacation rental makes a great bet for a family holiday, a corporate retreat or a special event like a wedding or a birthday. Experience the best of Cabo with Luxury Retreats!The backyard at this fabulous residence boasts oceanfront views and spacious entertaining areas. You will find a covered area to enjoy a book in the shade and a large space for sunning next to the private heated swimming pool with built-in hot tub. Fire up the gas barbeque and enjoy the catch of the day at the poolside palapa. Relax in the hammocks and sun loungers. Guests of Villa Tranquil will have access to the Punta Ballena Beach Club with fitness center, the Esperanza Spa and the nearby restaurants, all just a short walk or drive in the golf cart included with the rental. Walking paths and tennis courts are also available nearby.The open plan kitchen, dining and living area enjoys sweeping ocean views and the layout and furnishings are perfect for convivial gatherings. The sliding glass doors open up completely for seamless indoor/outdoor living. The fully equipped kitchen features modern stainless steel appliances and a long breakfast bar.Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Three of the bedrooms are located in the main house, two of them with ocean views. The fourth bedroom is in the casita and has its own entrance. The casita is perfect for a couple still on honeymoon or guests requiring more privacy. Enjoy the sounds of the fountain as you fall sound asleep!Known for its nightlife and the fabulous El Arco rock formation, Cabo San Lucas is a dream destination. For lovers of water sports, the Los Cabos Corridor offers many options along its various beaches. Golf aficionados will feel right at home in the “Tourist Corridor” with its many championship courses. Old world Mexico combined with modern day amenities means a perfect holiday in the sun at Villa Tranquila!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sandy Shore Villa House presents sweeping ocean views from almost every room. This luxurious four-bedroom villa is found at Turtle Tail, a picturesque and peaceful part of Providenciales away from the crowds. A long rustic path leads you directly to your private stretch of white sandy beach where the turquoise Atlantic awaits. Take a break from the real world and enjoy a peaceful retreat you’ll never forget.The clear, shallow waters off you private beach are ideal for swimming and snorkeling. Push out on your kayaks and explore the five nearby islands that inspire the villa’s name. Spend easy afternoons relaxing on the large pool terrace, a bona fide oasis surrounded by lush tropical plants and flowers. Enjoy the Caribbean sun from a chaise longue or cool off with a dip in the soak pool. Escape the afternoon heat under the shelter of a scenic pergola. Watch the sun set over the horizon, but don’t think it’s time to head inside yet: light the barbecue and savor a starlight supper at your charming al fresco dining table.The interior is decorated in the traditional West Indies plantation style, with dark wood and rattan furnishings, plus lofty exposed-beam ceilings. French doors and sliding glass walls invite the refreshing trade winds inside, complimenting the central air-conditioning. The spacious great room is divided in two by elegant circular columns. On one side you’ll find a decadently soft living room set, facing a flatscreen TV. On the other side, a long dark-wood dining table and fully-equipped kitchen await your culinary creativity.The villa’s four beautifully-appointed bedrooms feature hand-selected furniture, soft linens, air conditioning and enclosed en-suites. Each room opens onto either a side patio or the pool terrace. The large Master suite includes an elegant four-poster bed and three sets of French doors leading outside. The second and third bedrooms are Queen suites and both look out to the spectacular Juba Salina inlet. The final bedroom contains a traditional West Indies style wood bed frame.Sandy Shore Villa privacy and tranquility, but when you’re ready for adventure, you’ll find it just ten minutes away in Grace Bay. There you’ll find more beaches as well as restaurants shopping and nightlife. Take a tour of the reef protected wonders of Princess Alexandra Marine Park and keep your eyes peeled for the island’s most famous resident: Jo Jo the dolphin.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This charming villa blends contemporary attitude with traditional French Caribbean style. Set in a tropical courtyard with circular drive, the grand raised entrance begins the crescendo for the view. Set right at the ocean’s edge, the stunning scene flows over the wide green lawn right out to the turquoise sea and beyond to Anguilla and the poetic mountains of St Martin. Step through the gate right out to the sand.Every room enjoys incredible views. The main living area’s glass doors disappear, giving you full access to the sea breezes and nature’s beauty. A spacious open plan includes multiple areas for lounging and dining. The villa’s décor tastefully mixes Indonesian teak with contemporary pieces in soft white. The sleek kitchen is a wonderful place to prepare a meal while taking advantage of the view and your guests.Ample outdoor living includes sea facing covered verandas that connect all the rooms with the main house providing multiple opportunities for dining and relaxing. Oversize travertine tiles flow throughout blending the Epi wood pool deck for a seamless transition from interior to exterior. The large classic pool, the centerpiece of the deck, creates a visual connection with the sea. A grand gazebo sits at the ocean’s edge where you can relax in comfortable seating and enjoy the music of the surf from sunrise to sunset. If you prefer private garden views, a large well-furnished deck sits off the main living area. Large and small colorful tropical gardens are placed throughout the villa.Four of the five bedrooms have private seating areas and sea views. The fifth bedroom is located at garden level with a private patio. The décor is a mix of soothing whites and warm beiges. The en suite bathrooms have a stylish spa feel complete with river stone trimmed showers, teak benches and marble tiles. Several bathrooms have ocean views.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. you are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg. _ Please Note: Baie Rouge Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. For the best swimming renters are recommended to walk down the beach near the public entrance where the waters are more protected. _

listing.listing_description: Palmilla 62 is a luxury villa in the exclusive Corridor region of Los Cabos. With spectacular ocean views, a private pool and spa, access to the world-renowned One & Only Palmilla hotel, and the first Jack Nicklaus golf course in Latin America just minutes away, this four-bedroom vacation rental is simply ideal for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking exquisite privacy at the romantic tip of Baja California.The villa's exterior features an elegant ocean-view terrace surrounding a swimming pool with lovely wall fountain. With loungers, sunbeds, sunbeds, parasols, and a covered lounge area, you'll enjoy long Los Cabos days in the sun and shade, sipping cocktails as you gaze at the azure, palm-framed waters. In the evening, take a delicious soak in the hot tub, and gather around the fire pit when the cooler breezes blow. At dinnertime, pass through classic archways into the lovely portico, where you can relish an alfresco feast.Wide doors open from the portico into the villa's interior, where the open-plan living area features a beautiful dining table for eight and a cozy lounge facing the mounted television. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef grade appliances and a breakfast bar for three. From the exposed wooden beams, to the beautiful original artwork, to the wrought iron chandelier and exquisite furnishings, the villa's décor evokes the classy naturalism and elegance of Old Mexico.The bedrooms are luminous, comfortable, and furnished with sumptuous simplicity. Both of the master bedrooms feature a king size bed, a walk-in closet, and a glass door opening to a covered patio with ocean view; and their ensuite bathrooms include stand-alone showers and bathtubs. The third and fourth bedrooms also have king size beds, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers.Palmilla 62 is ideally situated for savoring Los Cabos and the exclusive Palmilla community. Walk five minutes to Palmilla Beach, or ride the golf cart to the One & Only Palmilla, world-famous for its amenities and unparalleled service. The Palmilla Golf Course is also just 10 minutes away by golf cart. Beyond Palmilla, spend an afternoon in the nearby bohemian town of San José del Cabo, or drive along the coast to enjoy the famous nightlife of Cabo San Lucas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gracefully-outfitted, spacious and with impeccable views, this Miami penthouse is the epitome of high living in the beachfront metropolis. Guests will love the high ceilings and gleaming marble surfaces, with a dramatic staircase descending to plush furniture, bold sculptures and tasteful decor. Modern and with great city access, Miami Beach and the Mary Brickell Village shopping hub are nearby.Welcome bright Florida mornings from the balcony and wide windows of this home. As you set about your day, sunlight will illuminate the characterful carvings and sculptures of the home, with splashes of color punctuating a minimal, modern style. With centrally-controlled AC, relax in total comfort on the welcoming sofas, taking in the fully-equipped TV and entertainment system, which is rivalled by the dramatic Miami sky beyond. The wood-panelled, attractive kitchen is more than sufficient for self-catering, while the complex’s spa, gym and pool at your full disposal.From your reserved parking spot, you can travel from the Conrad Penthouse to a range of locations in a handful of minutes. The much-loved expanses of Miami Beach and popular Key Biscayne are just a short ride away, while guests can dive into the shopping options of nearby Mary Brickell Village as well as Miami’s downtown. A huge number of highly-rated international restaurants are also just a short drive away, while waterfront bars are a tempting option after a day on the local strips, beaches and local golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in Maundays Bay in Anguilla, Infinity at Sheriva villa successfully harmonizes traditional Caribbean style with touches from the Far East. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve. With postcard perfect views of neighboring St. Martin and the Caribbean Sea, this chic villa redefines the art of luxury escape.All three main level rooms have direct access to the expansive terrace which leads to the infinity swimming pool with a built-in hot tub. You will find a second swimming pool on the lower deck. Step out of the water into an alfresco shower. The elegant shared spaces offer tech-savvy comforts such as plasma televisions, DVD players, poolside Bose surround sound and Wi-Fi so that your stay can be as relaxing or as festive as you desire. Fire up the barbeque and enjoy some outdoor dining as you overlook the tropical landscape. A complimentary golf cart helps you zip around. Indoors, you will find a media room with a wet bar. Your reservation includes housekeeping, night security and a variety of perks.The finest materials accent every inch of this expansive haven including exquisite marble floors and balustrades, exotic hardwood ceilings and immaculate granite countertops. The sunken living room exudes the richness of elegant island living. The kitchen offers contemporary comforts such as GE Monogram appliances.The Grand Villa Suite features a walk-in dressing room, Balinese daybed lounge area, double showers and an infinity-edge marble bathtub. The ground floor offers a two-bedroom suite with a media room with wet bar and kitchenette. The king en-suite with garden view boasts a heavenly bathroom accented with marble and travertine. The king garden suite with its unique ‘tunnel’ design rounds out the ground floor. The Loft Suite has a balcony, kitchenette and adjacent sun terrace. The eight bedrooms accommodate up to eighteen guests.Due to its pristine decor and idyllic tropical setting, Infinity at Sheriva has become a popular spot for weddings and other special events. The villa is perfect for large family get-togethers and corporate retreats. Additional rate-inclusive services include a welcome wine basket, afternoon canapés, complimentary shuttle service to Maundays Bay beach, beach chairs and umbrellas as well as signing privileges at Cap Juluca’s three world class restaurants – Pimms, Blu and Spice.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking the beautiful sandy beach of Baie Rouge, this stately hillside villa offers breathtaking ocean views from all three of its king en-suite bedrooms. Perfect for an elegant island getaway, villa Beaulieu is adorned with the highest end amenities, sure to satisfy the most discerning luxury travelers. Nearby, you’ll love exploring the many secluded beachfront coves, exciting fusion restaurants, and duty-free shopping in Marigot.Beaulieu’s white walls, spacious vaulted-ceilings, terracotta floors, and wide archways to the patio display all the classic stylings of a Caribbean beach house. Mix that with state of the art appliances and electronics, and you’ve got an unbeatable destination for your next amazing Luxury Retreat. The vibrant greens of mature palm trees and glowing turquoise ocean views are the focal points of Beaulieu’s every room. You’ll love the feeling the of the fresh ocean breeze, and the warmth of natural sunlight flowing through the interior spaces, drawing you out to Saint Martin’s breathtaking environment.Once inside Beaulieu’s electric gates, you’ll appreciate the incredible amount of privacy on the estate’s beautifully landscaped, ocean-view patio. You’ll appreciate the outdoor doing and lounge areas, equipped with mosquito traps to keep unwanted visitors away. The heated pool is the perfect place for a quick dip when you don’t feel like hitting the beach. Inside, satellite television, a sound system, and air conditioning will satisfy your tech needs. And, the villa comes with daily housekeeping, a caretaker, and onsite maintenance for anything that may pop up.The nearest beaches to villa Beaulieu are Baie Rouge, Plum Bay, Cupecoy, and Mullet Bay, all of which are between three and five minutes from home. After you’ve spent a few days enjoying the sand and surf, head into the town of Marigot, known for its duty-free shopping, nightlife, and exciting fusion cuisine. Marigot is the French capital of the island, so you’ll find plenty of quaint cafes and bakeries, as well as fine dining. If you’d prefer to dine-in, pick up something fresh from the Creole Market, and make us of that barbecue on the terrace.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled along the white sands of Taylor Bay Beach in Providenciales Villa Sorrento is the ideal vacation rental for honeymoons and romantic getaways. The beautiful, one-bedroom residence—part of a private complex of three spectacular luxury villas—features dreamy indoor and outdoor living areas, spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea, and one of the finest locations in Turks and Caicos.Enjoy heavenly days and evenings on your secluded stretch of beach, diving into the turquoise waters of the ocean, playing your favorite watersports, and gazing out at the heavenly horizon. Return to your villa's private terrace and plunge into the delicious swimming pool before savoring the Caribbean sun on elegant loungers as you sip fine Champagne. Fire up the grill for a lavish seafood barbeque and share a memorable meal at the alfresco table, illuminated by lovely lighting.The villa's living room opens directly to the terrace through wide glass doors, imbuing the interior with a wonderful plein-air feel. The light-filled and fully equipped kitchen is the perfect setting for mixing drinks and cooking wonderful feasts, which you'll savor at the elegant dining table. The sumptuous lounge is the ideal setting for evenings together. The villa's interior décor is exquisite and tasteful throughout, with fine artwork and beautiful touches of ocean color that capture and enhance the island's precious natural beauty.On the upper floor, the master bedroom suite is perfectly designed for enjoying the spectacular ocean views—whether from the sumptuous king size bed, the furnished balcony, or the ensuite bathroom joined to the bedroom by an open wall. Relish peaceful nights of sleep to the ocean's rhythm. Sip your morning coffee as you gaze upon the pool, shoreline, and sea. Bathe in the stand-alone tub and refresh yourself in the stand-alone shower.At Villa Sorrento, you'll enjoy not only direct beach access but shared access to the complex's private tennis court. And beyond your villa, you'll enjoy wonderful proximity to the shops and nightlife of Providenciales, the world-class golf of Provo Golf and Country Club, the famous Grace Bay, and the precious natural treasures of Princess Alexandra National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sandy Bottom is a spectacular beachfront villa in Turks and Caicos, situated in the Turtle Tail region on the south shore of Providenciales. The contemporary masterwork by local architect Ron Shaw was designed to maximize the sublime ocean views of the Caicos Banks, while its energy comes entirely from onsite solar panels. Ample outdoor living areas include a rooftop terrace, waterfront lounge, well-appointed kitchen, and infinity swimming pool. Four bedroom suites (a lofty master in the main house and three guest suites with entrances) accommodate eight guests.The elevated pool stretches toward the turquoise panorama, with an exquisite sunbed perched at its extremity. The adjoining pavilion features a superb grill and swim-up bar, while the nearby table seats eight for alfresco meals. Lounge chairs are positioned by the pool and on the tiered terraces, beckoning you to long hours in the Caribbean sun. Descending to the beach, you'll discover secluded hammocks and a lounge with fire pit. At sunset, gather on the roof terrace to behold the sublime, 360-degree views.The luminous interior living areas open directly to the veranda, pool terrace, and back balcony, infusing the home with natural light and extraordinary views of the sea and island. The lounge features a high-end retractable TV, allowing you to watch your favorite shows or simply admire the vistas. The stunning kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a large breakfast bar, and the dining table seats ten beside an expansive glass wall opening to the terrace. Air conditioning and ceiling fans keep the atmosphere cool, and there is also a lovely office with an inspiring vantage.The master suite (atop the main house) enjoys a wrap-around balcony and breathtaking ocean views through three glass walls, while its ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity and alfresco shower. The three guest suites feature ensuite bathrooms and direct access to the pool area. All of the bedrooms include safes, closets, and TVs.From this private setting, you're just five minutes from town and an easy drive to Provo Golf Club, Turks & Caicos Island Tennis Club, and Grace Bay Beach. Princess Alexandra National Park is just seven kilometers away. Proximity to Providenciales International Airport makes Sandy Bottom a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting on Anguilla’s South Shore, Anani - Kamique commands stunning views of a secluded beach cove and the mountains of St Martin. You will be just paces away from a private swath of cool white sand, complete with padded sun loungers, shaded day bed and gazebo. Dramatically nestled in the rolling landscape to form special enclaves, the surrounding waters at Anani are protected by a reef that offers calm waters and excellent snorkeling.Jump into an impressive rectangular infinity swimming pool, great for laps or just cooling off. Take advantage of the two outdoor showers as you make your way into ample patches of sun and shade overlooking the clear waters of the Caribbean. A gas barbeque sets the tone for some luscious alfresco dining. Indoors at Anani, you will find a home entertainment system and Wi- Fi. The villa is wheelchair accessible and makes a great bet for multigenerational families and diverse groups. Your reservation includes management, concierge and housekeeping services as well as daily continental breakfasts.The modern and chic interiors of Anani showcase a rich blend of woods, stone and concrete to create a sensual, yet modern island environment. A touch of the tropics provides a sense of romance at this idyllic escape. The atmosphere blurs the line between inside and out and orchestrates light and shade to create peaceful oases among the ongoing dance of chiaroscuro patterns.The four exquisite bedrooms at Anani accommodate up to eight fortunate guests. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans, televisions and complimentary l’Occitane toiletries. The two grand master suites each offer an outdoor shower with a private sunning area. Fall asleep with nothing but the sound of ocean waves as your soundtrack.During your stay at Anani - Kamique, you will be within easy reach of the beach and ocean, town and groceries as well as the CuisinArt Golf Course and Spa. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. History buffs can also stop in at the Heritage Museum or the Amerindian Ceremonial Site to take a glimpse into this island’s rich past. Come experience the best of Anguilla!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: World-class golf, gorgeous beachfront, and some of the most exciting nightlife on the planet at your doorstep at Golf Villa 22. Overlooking the tenth hole of the Dunes Course, this luxurious four bedroom is the perfect home base for an unforgettable golf vacation. Located within the Diamante Resort, one of the World’s most prestigious golf destinations, you'll have quick and easy access to courses designed by Tiger Woods and Davis Love III, as well as numerous other courses in the surrounding area. And, Golf Villa is just a few kilometers from the always exciting tourism hot spot, Cabo San Lucas.Golf Villa 22’s spacious interior is decorated with stately furniture, elegant stonework, and the highest end electronics. You and your group will surely appreciate the villa’s social atmosphere, especially when the room-length sliding doors are open to the terrace. Inside and out, Golf Villa was made to host. With barrier-free access, the living room, swimming pool terrace, wet bar, and alfresco dining set all flow into one and other, enhancing the social vibes. Get ready for exciting nights gathered around the fire pit, watching the big game at the wet bar, and soaking up the Cabo sun at Golf Villa 22.On the Diamante Resort, you’ll have shared access to their three scenic golf courses, the ten-acre Crystal Lagoon swimming pool, their fitness center, spa, and several great bars and restaurants. The villa comes with an on-resort shuttle service, and plenty of other helpful amenities.After you’ve played a round or two on all three of Diamante’s incredible golf courses, give yourself a little rest and relaxation at one of Cabo’s beautiful beachfront areas. Medano and Lover’s Beach are two of the most popular beaches in the country, both about fifteen kilometers from home. You’ll find plenty of exciting nightlife, dining, and shopping opportunities are Cabo San Lucas’ downtown beach areas. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, visit San Jose Del Cabo, which features a vibrant arts and culture scene, with lots of galleries, museums, and fine dining in and around the towns Main Square.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: At the end of a private beach road, located in the exclusive community of the Terres Basses, is Le Mas des Sables, an oceanfront luxury villa with the feel of a country home found in the South of France. Renovated in 2018, the villa incorporates high-end furnishing along with a brand new modern kitchen and extended pool and terrace. The villa has evolved into a contemporary home that will find guests wishing it was their very own. The elegant entrance with its traditional iron gate, coral stone-paved courtyard and stonewalls is the perfect showcase for this charming villa. The moment you approach the front door; the stunning panoramic views begin to unfold. With the advantage of a gentle hill setting, the view is a very intimate experience set away from the clamor of daily life. The green mountains, deep blue sea and sky, the sandy beach, Anguilla and tropical foliage flow like a painting. Step through the villa’s private beach gate and you have access to a very secluded sandy inlet. Built on multi-levels to take advantage of the setting, the design creates privacy from every angle. Beautiful native stonework flows through the structure and grounds. The improved terrace areas are dotted with spaces for seating and dining. The fully air-conditioned great room, open to the view and breeze, is fully refurbished in serene colours. Travertine floors run throughout. The fabulous new French kitchen is straight from a design book on Provence. Unique pieces like the antique French butcher’s table, charming accessories and stylish modern stove create the perfect atmosphere to prepare gourmet meals. Garden and sea view surround the kitchen while also overlooking the renovated and enlarged swimming pool. The three bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are stylishly unique and exotic; each with a different design theme. All have sea views and two have been enlarged to include private seating areas with outdoor terraces. One bedroom is on the first level and only steps from the pool. The two upper-level bedrooms each open to the covered terrace but can also connect via a locked shared door via the master bathroom. A seclude outdoor reading area can be found at the end of the covered balcony.Although quite secluded you are a short walk to Baie Rouge Beach and just steps from the snorkeling site, Trou David, a famous landmark in St-Martin. You are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

listing.listing_description: Get a true Costa Rica experience at LunaKai, where open-air living spaces truly immerse you in the lush landscape. The beach is only steps from your door, the surf break at Santa Teresa is 5 minutes away, and restaurants, bars and shops are only a short drive from this laid-back vacation rental.Listen to the waves lapping at the shore or feel the warm breezes from the villa’s sunny deck, infinity pool or palapa-covered loveseat. A gate at the edge of the private yard leads to the beach; after a swim or some sand-castle building, rinse off in the outdoor shower.Though the villa’s great room is covered by a roof, its open sides create a seamless indoor-outdoor living space. Sleek modern furnishings, like the matching pair of settees in the sitting area, are a stylish counterpoint to the riot of texture and color on the villa’s oceanfront lot. The kitchen is minimalist but fully equipped, and in keeping with the ambience of breezy luxury, the dining area feels like an extension of the central island.Three bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, make LunaKai large enough for a family holiday yet small enough for a honeymoon. Where the main living areas are open-air, the bedrooms are all enclosed and have air conditioning. The master suite has a king bed, al-fresco shower and ocean views, and the other two bedrooms have queen beds.Though you could easily spend your stay peering into the tidepools or watching the horizon from North Santa Teresa beach, just in front of LunaKai, you’ll hardly need to put on sandals for the 5-minute walk to the more well-known Santa Teresa beach, home to one of the area’s best surf breaks. There’s also a grocery store within walking distance, and dining, shopping and nightlife are all only a 5-minute drive from the villa.Guests at LunaKai have access to all of Florblanca’s amenities, except the pool and gym facilities. There’s a restaurant, a bar, a spa and yoga/pilates available to the guests with reservations and at extra cost. The five-star luxury hotel is a 2-minute walk from the villa and is the only luxury hotel in the area, and one of the very best in all of Costa Rica. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Estate Belvedere is a boutique villa located in St. Croix, the largest of the US Virgin Islands. This property spans over three and a half acres and has six bedchambers for a total capacity of sixteen guests with ample room for an additional fifty guests for special events. The estate has recently been renovated in order to incorporate certain upgrades, though in such a way to keep alive large elements of the centuries old architecture and history.Stays at Estate Belvedere leave guests in a state of total serenity. The grounds feature immaculately manicured gardens that produce an indisputable utopian effect. Guests can whittle away the hours sunbathing on the terrace’s comfortable furnishings next to the large stone swimming pool. Modern amenities at Estate Belvedere include climate control, an entertainment center, Wi-Fi and a fully equipped exercise room.Originally the main building on Estate Belvedere was built as a sugar mill in 1791 and retains its old world charm regardless of the recent upgrades. The interior showcases elements of design that reflect the quiet sophistication from an era gone by and are complemented by a choice selection of elegant furnishings. A modern gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances makes cooking a pleasure with the little added bonus of a delightful herb garden.Estate Belvedere’s six bedrooms are sophisticated yet understated, adding to an already cozy atmosphere. All bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and climate control. Three of the six bedrooms are located in the main building, two of which possess a king size bed, and a third room has a queen. The three remaining bedrooms are found in the tower, with one room containing a queen bed and the two other rooms, two queen size beds, each with the added feature of direct terrace access.Nothing is too far on St. Croix for guests of Estate Belvedere – and there is plenty to see and do. Cane Bay Beach is a popular spot, where snorkeling and scuba diving are incredibly satisfying. An elite Country Club is located nearby for golf and tennis enthusiasts, as well as the island’s world-famous bioluminescent bays, which are a feast for the eyes and should perhaps be on everyone’s ‘bucket list.’ Enjoy a perfect Caribbean vacation with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This two-bedroom luxury apartment is located within Tamarind Hills, an extraordinary community of villas on the south shore of Antigua, within walking distance of Darkwood and Ffryes Beaches. Superbly appointed for a rejuvenating Caribbean getaway, the private home features an outdoor plunge pool, ample living and dining areas, and a fully equipped kitchen. Each of the ocean-view bedrooms features a king bed and ensuite bathroom, accommodating up to four guests in total comfort. The vacation rental includes housekeeping and 24-hour security, while numerous deluxe services are available.The apartment is nestled amid flowering gardens and lush palm trees, yielding to sweeping views of the turquoise sea. Lounge chairs invite you to bask in the exquisite sunlight, while the plunge pool offers cool refreshment under the sun or stars. The shaded deck includes a barbecue grill and sea-view table for four. Lovely wooden boardwalks follow the coastline from the villas to the nearby beaches.Folding glass doors join the terrace with the open-concept interior, infusing the home with gorgeous views and soothing breezes. The kitchen features chef-quality appliances for the contemporary gourmet, and opens to the alfresco dining deck. Air conditioning, excellent media features, and an office nook create a comfortable environment for all guests. The décor balances modern sophistication with natural wood accents and touches of Caribbean artistry.The bedrooms provide peaceful private havens for couples or individual travelers, with high ceilings, air conditioning, satellite and cable TV, celling fans, and a balcony. The cavernous master bedroom enjoys exceptional views, with a corner location and ample windows framing the sea.Tamarind Hills offers an ideal balance of stylish comfort, privileged privacy, and a prime location within easy reach of some of Antigua's finest beaches and nightlife spots. In addition to Darkwood and Ffryes, you're a three-minute drive from Coco Beach, and within walking distance of Old Sugar Windmill Ruins.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This elegant beach house sits adjacent to Hawksbill Estate in the fabulous Turks and Caicos. This two-bedroom vacation rental offers a private kitchen and living space, making it a perfect choice for a couples’ retreat, a family holiday, a special event like a wedding or a tropical honeymoon. Just walking distance from the championship 18 holes at the Provo Golf Club, make it one to remember at this oceanfront property right on the bright sands of Grace Bay!Have a splash in the refreshing waters of the swimming pool just paces from the white sands and turquoise of the sea. With plenty of sun loungers and a lovely alfresco dining set and lounge, this Beach House has got you covered for fun in the sun.The interiors of the Beach House at Hawksbill are spacious and luminous. Take a little break from the sun in the comfortable living area. The open plan space also includes a stylish formal dining area as well as a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Other perks include an ice maker, cable television, air conditioning and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The two immaculate bedrooms at this non-smoking villa accommodate up to four guests. Both bedrooms include king size beds, televisions, ceiling fans, balconies and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers and his-and-hers vanities. The master suite also provides a bidet. Fine linens and accoutrements provide soothing nights of rest with nothing but the gentle lapping of ocean waves as your soundtrack.In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Step into your own corner of paradise at Casa Estrella, a luxury home in lush surroundings with beautiful views. Located behind the gates of the Four Seasons on the exclusive Peninsula Papagayo, this stunning Costa Rica vacation rental is just minutes from a premiere golf course, picturesque beaches and thrilling zipline courses. Five bedrooms spread between three buildings offer suite-style accommodations and the ultimate in private retreats.Though the villa has ocean views from every room, you’ll want to spend your stay listening to the waves (and local fauna like the white-face monkeys) from the outdoor living and dining area, which features tables, chairs, loungers and a barbecue spread out around a custom infinity pool and hot tub. For entertainment, there’s Apple TV, Wi-Fi, indoor-outdoor surround sound and a wet bar. Guests even have the option to charter one of the property owner’s 38-foot fishing yachts at extra cost during their stay, where eight to ten friends or family can test their mettle on the tuna tower, relax in the air-conditioned cabin or chat with the English-speaking captain and two mates.The open-plan living area is contemporary and neutral, with Asian-inspired pieces adding a touch of the exotic and bamboo, organic cottons, silk and stone adding natural textures. A sleek leather sectional flanks a lacquered console and media center in the living room, and green upholstery and rattan blinds in the adjacent dining room echo the vibrant landscape outside. The fully equipped kitchen has a striking breakfast bar with a natural stone base.The five bedrooms at Casa Estrella are spread out among the main house and two separate guest suites. Each bedroom has an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and television, and opens to a terrace. In the two guest suites, you’ll find a bedroom with a king bed that feels like your own honeymoon-worthy haven within the villa. The main house has two bedrooms with a king bed and one with two single-over-double bunk beds.During your holiday at Casa Estrella, be sure to book a tee time at the 18-hole, Arnold Palmer–designed golf course just a short walk away. Adventurous travelers can book a surf lesson against the famous backdrop of Witches Rock or paddle a canoe or sea kayak to one of Papagayo’s more secluded beaches, while beginning swimmers and children may enjoy the calmer waters of Playa del Coco. Nearby Playa Grande is another spot that’s not only popular with surfers, but with leatherback turtles as a nesting site.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Built right on the beachfront of San Jose’s Encanto La Laguna, this private luxury villa has incomparable ocean views. Its terrace is literally steps from the pristine sandy beaches of The Sea of Cortez. With six bedrooms and accommodations for twelve, Encantada is perfect for a family getaway or a beach vacation with friends. And, for the avid golfers in the group, Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course is just a short drive from your beachfront home.Encantada’s earthy exterior, low profile clay tiled roof, and elegant columns and archways are all trademarks of Spanish Colonial architecture. High vaulted ceilings with exposed wood beams, an open concept floor plan, and seamless merging of indoor and outdoor spaces create a unified flow from the beachfront to the living room couch. Stylish decor and designer furniture fill Encantada’s interior, setting the scene for a posh dinner soiree, or a cozy night in with the family. The gourmet kitchen is stocked with state of the art stainless steal appliances, a wine cooler, and plenty of marble countertop workspace.Inside Encantada’s castle-like walls you’ll find formal dining for eight, satellite television, a wet bar, sound system, fireplace, and more. Out on the terrace there’s a private hay roofed palapa, sun loungers, outdoor living areas, and a hot tub, all surrounding the luxurious infinity pool. The terrace is the perfect setting for an afternoon meal. With a gas barbecue, fire pit, and alfresco dining, it’s easy to prepare and enjoy a meal out in the sun. Also included with rental, daily housekeeping, an on-site security guard, and garage parking within this gated beachfront community.If you feel like a trip to the city, San Jose del Cabo is about twenty minutes away from the villa. Well known for its exciting tourism, historical architecture, and beautiful art galleries, San Jose del Cabo is a great place to spend an afternoon exploring.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Discover a not-so-hidden Costa Rican gem at Villa La Perla. Set near the beach on the lush grounds of the exclusive Los Suenos Resort and Marina, the luxury villa is nevertheless a private tropical oasis in elegant Spanish Colonial style. For couples, there are four suite-style bedrooms spread out over the main house and guest house; for families, there’s a pool plus kid-friendly activities at the resort.Your stay at Villa La Perla includes access to the Los Suenos Beach Club, Marina and restaurants and bars; you can book tee times at the Los Suenos Golf Course. But you can also choose to simply stay at the villa and revel in the views of the water and garden from a lounge chair on the terrace or a seat at the al-fresco dining area. Kids will love the freeform infinity pool; adults will want to soak in the hot tub. (Younger guests may need supervision for safety, as the villa’s patio leads directly to the pool.) After a day of playing in the sun and sand, try out local specialties on the barbecue and share photos from your vacation via the house’s Wi-Fi.It may be perfect for tropical vacations for families, but that doesn’t mean Villa La Perla is lacking in flair. From the stately wooden front door to the grand vaulted ceiling in the great room, the villa invites you to make yourself at home in style. Softly textured cream walls and polished stone floors are a Tuscan-inspired backdrop for a roomy sectional in the sitting area and curved-back chairs under a sparkling chandelier in the dining area. Enjoy meals in a more casual setting at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.There are three bedrooms in the main house at Villa La Perla and one in a guest house. An en-suite bathroom in each of the villa’s bedrooms gives the property all the comfort of a five-star resort. In the main house, the master suite has a king bed and jetted tub, and one other bedroom has its own king bed. The third main-house bedroom has two double beds. In the guest house, you’ll find a bedroom with a king bed as well as a kitchenette.Book your flight into Juan Santamaria International Airport, 60 minutes from the resort. When you’re at Villa La Perla, going to the beach is as easy as slipping on sandals and walking 5 minutes to Playa Herradura, and golfing is as easy as changing your shoes and walking 10 minutes to La Iguana Golf Course. There’s plenty to explore at Los Suenos, from the beach club to the marina, and beaches like Playa Jaco and Playa Blanco are also within easy driving distance. If you’d like to see more of Costa Rica, plan a visit to the city of San Jose, 60 miles away.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Experience the wildness of Costa Rica and the peace of mind of a gated community at Villa 8: Terraces at San Martin. Perched above the Pacific in a quiet enclave, this private modern vacation rental offers stunning views over the rainforest to the jungle, not to mention a location close to beaches, national parks, waterfalls and more. Its setting in an exclusive residential area makes it ideal for a laid-back holiday with family or a getaway with friends.Take in the ocean views from the villa's terrace, which has an infinity pool, plenty of loungers and a barbecue. If available, head to the Elan at Ballena Beach Club, where guests of the Terraces at San Martin are welcome. Inside the villa, a TV and Wi-Fi give you the option of staying connected-but you can always choose the luxury of being unplugged, too.Watch the sun move across the water or see tropical rainshowers fly up the coast from the villa's L-shaped great room, which wraps around the terrace to offer its own panoramic views. Living and dining areas filled with chic modern pieces make up the legs of the L, and in the center is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.Villa 8 has two bedrooms with king beds, including one with ocean views, and one bedroom with two queen beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, for the warmest nights, both air conditioning and ceiling fans.Whether you're in Costa Rica to enjoy warm weather with friends, try activities as a family or have an adventurous honeymoon, Villa 8 puts you at the heart of the country's signature rainforest-meets-ocean landscape-the perfect place to experience everything from ziplining and whitewater rafting to hiking and snorkeling. It's a short drive from two beaches, Marino Ballena National Park and the Nauyaca waterfalls, plus, for dinners out or a little souvenir, it's an easy trip to restaurants and shops in the town of Dominical.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its ocean views, inviting outdoor living areas and sophisticated interiors, Villa del Corazon will capture your heart. And because it’s close to beaches, tennis, dining and nightlife in downtown Cabo San Lucas and set along a golf course, the property puts you at the heart of Cabo. Sleek rooms in textures like travertine and wood and seven suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate casita, round out the luxe experience.Villa del Corazon is laid out around a wide ocean-facing terrace with a heated pool, jetted tub, sunny and shaded lounge areas, an al-fresco dining table, a bar and kitchen area with a gas barbecue and a shower for post-swim rinses. When the sun goes down, head inside to gather around the satellite television, share photos via Wi-Fi, flip on the sound system or select a bottle from the wine fridge.Dark wood paneling and pale travertine tile make for a modern contrast inside Villa del Corazon. A consistent color scheme of cream and brown gives the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen a chic, sophisticated feel, while the space’s vaulted ceilings keep it airy and bright. The clean lines of the sofa and armchairs are echoed by the upholstered dining chairs, but the color scheme gets a slight twist in the granite countertops of the fully equipped kitchen.There are six bedrooms in the main house at Villa del Corazon and one in a separate casita; all seven bedrooms have air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, the master suite has a king bed and ocean view and opens to the pool deck. There are four other bedrooms with king beds, three of which open to a shared terrace, and one bedroom with two king beds. The casita has a bedroom with a king bed that opens to a shared terrace.Whether you want an active or relaxed vacation, the villa has plenty to offer. It’s located right on the Cabo del Sol Ocean golf course and is 11.3 km from Canchas de Tenis, just over 11.9 km from Tennis Club Pedregal and 12.3 km from Cabo Real Golf Club. Spend a day by the ocean at Tabasco Beach, 9.3 km away, or Médano Beach, 10 km away. Reserve an evening to take in the nightlife in downtown Cabo San Lucas, 6.5 miles from the villa, or spend an afternoon exploring Land’s End, 7 miles away, Cabo del Sol, 8 miles away, or San Jose del Cabo, 14.5 miles away. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 35.1 km trip from Villa del Corazon to Los Cabos International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the much sought after Sugar Hill Resort community, Half Century House is an inviting Barbados luxury villa that offers breathtaking views of the sparkling Caribbean Sea. Just minutes from Gibbes and Sandy Lane Beach as well as the Royal Westmoreland Golf Course, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate holiday in the sun!The grounds at this exquisite vacation rental feature a palatial swimming pool as well as plenty of sun loungers. Anyone up for a barbeque? Hop into the shade of the gazebo for some lovely alfresco dining. The outdoor living area makes a great spot for a board game or just curling up with a good book. The interiors of Half Century House feature a formal dining area with seating for eight, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and baby equipment. Your reservation includes cooking, housekeeping and laundry services.Inside this impeccable private home, tasteful, neutral tones interplay with the cool coral stone finishes to create an air of simple refinement, with a Caribbean twist. On the ground floor, the porte cochère ushers you into a welcoming foyer. The ground floor comprises a modern, well equipped kitchen, powder room and a sunken living room opening to a generous covered terrace which flows onto the pool deck. From here, a balustrade of coral stone steps lead down to the beautifully maintained tropical garden.Six exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. The comfortable master suite opens onto a private terrace, where magnificent views over the pool, gardens and sea beyond can be savored. For canoodling couples or older children who prefer to have more privacy, the self-contained cottage, located just off the pool deck, provides comfortable accommodation. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, and access to the outdoors is a breeze.Half Century House is ideally positioned within a minute’s walk of the resort clubhouse. Guests will enjoy access to the resort’s wide range of on-site amenities including floodlit tennis courts, a communal pool, the fitness facility, restaurants and 24-hour security. This villa makes a great bet for a family getaway, a corporate retreat, a dream wedding or even a decadent honeymoon. Enjoy the best of Barbados!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you’d like your beach holiday to feature more than sun and sand, look no further than Casa de los Suenos - Santa Teresa. This vacation rental offers views over the lush Costa Rica rainforest to the ocean, pristine surroundings filled with exotic wildlife and easy access to outdoor adventure. The three bedrooms mean you can invite up to six friends and family members to join in—or reserve the whole residence for a tropical honeymoon.Watch the sun move over the water from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool and loungers, and as it sinks toward the horizon, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table for eight. After dark, play a game on the pool or ping-pong tables, turn on the TV or share snaps of the day’s adventures via Wi-Fi.Sliding doors separate the villa’s great room from the veranda for a seamless indoor-outdoor feel. The L-shaped open-concept space means you can enjoy the ocean views from the sitting area, a dining table for ten or the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. A vaulted, wood-paneled ceiling gives the whole space a breezy, welcoming vibe.Each of the three bedrooms at Casa de los Suenos has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Two of the bedrooms open to the terrace, and the third has an al-fresco shower, private balcony and ocean views.This luxury property is less than a 10-minute drive from some of the area’s best beaches. Try out surfing on the sandy stretch of Playa Santa Teresa or snorkel and swim in the scenic cove of Playa Hermosa. After a day of playing in the water, drive into town for shopping, dining and nightlife—or make the equally short trip to the grocery store and get ready for a quiet evening in.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A vibrant blue gate sets the stage for mesmerizing sea views, photogenic sunsets, unique water features and stylish tropical living straight out of a design magazine. Entering through the courtyard, a pebbled tropical stream flows invitingly around the upper level. Walk through the blue front door and a panoramic vision in brilliant greens and blues flows all the way from the turquoise pool to the sea and beyond to the horizon. The scene is dramatic, magical and serene.Open, airy interior and exterior rooms, with high vaulted ceilings and creamy stone floors, blend seamlessly to create a chicly contemporary, comfortable space. Expansive floor to ceiling glass walls and sliding glass doors open wide to the sea view, the upper pool and spacious outdoor terraces for al fresco dining and lounging. Soft white walls, colorful modern art and accessories plus sleek furniture in off-white and taupe are complemented by dark woods for an inviting and relaxing style. Off the dining area, facing the sea, is a modern, open kitchen in white, grey, steel and black granite.The four bedrooms are housed in two wings. Every bedroom is equal size with sea and lower pool views. The interiors are sleek and tranquil in whites and neutrals accented with color pops; each room distinctive in blue, turquoise, brown and red. The beautiful spa style marble and stone bathrooms feature spacious walk in showers with sea and pool views; one has a private outdoor shower.3 bedrooms are off the main space. The upper bedroom terrace has views of the sea and beautiful lower pool. Downstairs are two pool level bedrooms each with views, private terraces and ladders so you can dip in the pool from your room. The fourth bedroom, with direct lower pool access, is across the upper level “river” and downstairs with its own private entry just off the upper level pool.Although very secluded, you are very close to amenities. Walk to Plum Beach. 10 minute drive brings you to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case; 30 to Philipsburg’s shopping haven and a mere 10 to the airport.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a blissful visit to some of the world’s best beaches at Villa Sunset Close. Follow the winding road past the bluffs and bright blue waters of Chalk Sound to the exclusive Silly Creek neighborhood, where this gorgeous Turks and Caicos vacation rental sits on a private beach. Though the area is actually named for a 20th-century entrepreneur, the villa’s resort-worthy amenities and the island’s white-sand shores may make you wonder if your head’s been turned.The waterfront pool, shaded terrace with lounge chairs and separate deck are the perfect spots to stretch out with friends or family. Stroll into the warm water from your very own beach, or take the two-person kayaks or stand-up paddleboards on an expedition up Silly Creek. For dinner, nothing tastes better than local seafood, prepared on the barbecue and eaten al-fresco at the table overlooking the water. End the evening around the firepit or with a soak in the hot tub.Bright, sophisticated interiors lend Villa Sunset Close a feel of modern luxury. Double-height ceilings in the open-plan living room offer views of sea and sky, and vibrant red-tinged artwork sets off the cool white sofa and accent pieces. Step into the adjacent kitchen for a snack or cocktail at the bar, or to prep a favorite meal using the fully equipped space.The villa’s four dreamy bedrooms feature details like four-poster beds and ocean-inspired color schemes of deep blue and complementary coral red. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms; one opens to a terrace and the other to a balcony. The third bedroom has a king bed and the fourth has two extra-long twin beds (converted into a king bed on request), and share a bathroom, making them the perfect arrangement for parents on holiday with children.World-class beaches, balmy weather and a laid-back lifestyle make Turks and Caicos popular for relaxed honeymoons, idyllic destination weddings or golf getaways where every fairway looks straight off a postcard. Whether you’re on Providenciales to celebrate a special occasion or escape the everyday, Villa Sunset Close puts you just a short drive from shopping and dining, the natural wonders of Princess Alexandra National Park, the eighteen holes of Provo Golf Club and, of course, plenty of incredible palm-dotted scenery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Access the best of Punta Mita at Condo Ceres. As part of the exclusive Las Marietas community, this three-bedroom vacation rental offers ocean views, private outdoor living areas, a location close to beaches and golf, and a membership that will get you into the beach clubs and golf courses. Reserve this luxury property for a getaway with friends and family—or an indulgent Mexico honeymoon.Condo Ceres opens to an expansive terrace with lounging and dining areas, a sound system and an infinity pool, all facing the Pacific Ocean. Inside, the amenities range from a sound system and Wi-Fi to laundry facilities and elevator access. Your holiday also includes a premier membership to the Residents Beach Club, Kupuri Beach Club, Bahia and Pacifico golf courses, nearby tennis courts and a fitness center.A fold-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s great room from the terrace, inviting you to open the space for one large indoor-outdoor living area. Watch the ocean—or TV—from one of two sitting areas, gather around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a post-swim snack.Condo Ceres has two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two double beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ocean views, and open to furnished balconies.Thanks to the provided golf cart, it’s easy to get from the condo to nearby attractions. If you’ve come to Punta Mita for sun and sand, the villa is less than a half-mile from the St. Regis Beach Club and a short drive from the Residents and Kupuri beach clubs. For shopping and dining, drive to Punta Mita Village or Sayulita Village; for serious nightlife, spend an evening in downtown Puerto Vallarta.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hacienda Isla Capitan is a sensational villa within the Nuevo Vallarta resort community on Mexico's Riviera Nayarit. Nestled on an island beside El Tigre Golf Club, this vacation rental offers a sublime blend of tropical seclusion and convenient access to the natural, cultural, and sporting pleasures of this enchanting coastline. Like a private resort unto itself, it offers ample outdoor and indoor living areas, a fine professional staff and services, and five spacious bedrooms accommodating ten guests.Built by hand of organic materials, the home enjoys a cloistered ambiance amid lush gardens, towering palms, and beautifully masoned stone walls. Enjoy dreamy hours by the lagoon-style saltwater pool, dipping into its refreshing waters, running your head beneath the waterfall, and relaxing on elegant loungers and sunbeds. Relish home cooked feasts alfresco and savor classic Mexican cocktails from the outdoor bar in the evening. After sunset, gather around the fire pit or crawl into the hot tub for a starlit soak in the gentle Pacific air.Spacious and superbly decorated interiors inspire intimate gatherings with family and friends. An open kitchen with chef-ready appliances serves a comfortable lounge and rustic dining table for ten. Multiple salon areas invite you to relax in a hammock with a favorite book, or share a bottle of fine wine while playing your favorite tunes on the sound system or baby grand piano. The villa is well secured and its water purification system will provide fresh and potable water during your stay. High-end services include a chef and daily massages.The villa features three suites with king beds and one suite with two queen beds. One of the king suites includes a twin bed as well. Four of the rooms enjoy an ensuite bathroom and include air conditioning and a safe. The structure and décor of each bedroom is unique, but all provide sumptuous sanctuaries for afternoon siestas and peaceful nights.The villa's island is set within the canals of Nuevo Vallarta, leading out to the Bay of Banderas and Pacific Ocean. Family-friendly beaches, activities, and eco-adventures abound in this area, and the city of Puerto Vallarta is just seventeen kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover Saving Grace nestled amid lush tropical gardens and swaying palm trees, along the legendary North shore of Providenciales. This spectacular four-bedroom plantation-style manor features beautiful French doors and inviting verandas throughout allowing you to drink in the sweeping ocean views. Leave the real world behind as you stroll down your private path, arriving at a reef-protected beach, or spend unforgettable days basking under the warm Caribbean sun. The good life gets even better, as this villa includes daily housekeeping.Enjoy the first coffee of the day or host a seafood banquet at the outdoor dining area, shaded by a charming pergola. Brazilian hardwood decking lines the pool terrace where you’ll find a 40 ft heated pool surrounded by designer deck furniture. Seek adventure at the beach, where your water sports hut holds equipment for exploring Grace Bay. When your mission is complete rinse off under your al fresco shower. Shelter yourself from the mid-afternoon sun in a screened-in games room. As dusk settles, sip cocktails around the fire pit, as you watch the sky come alive with stars.Saving Grace’s warm ambiance is enhanced by understated and tasteful décor. Organic materials, such as wood and wicker, are used throughout to compliment the villa’s natural surroundings. Fresh air and light pour into the great room through sliding glass walls. Get creative in the fully-equipped chef’s kitchen, while your guests relax in a comfortable lounge, across the room. The kitchen features high-end appliances, granite counters and an immense wood-top island. Dine around the elegant wood table or take your meals al fresco.Saving Grace’s four spacious bedrooms are peaceful, private, and furnished with ultra-cozy beds and linens. The upper-level Master suite opens onto a wraparound veranda where you’ll witness daily sunsets. Its en-suite houses a soak tub and seven-point walk-in shower. The three well-appointed guest bedrooms alternate between ocean view and terrace access. Each bedroom features air-conditioning and a television.Whether you’ve come to Turks and Caicos for a quiet retreat or a grand celebration, Saving Grace puts you in the perfect position to enjoy the best of the islands. The upscale shops, restaurants and beach clubs of Grace Bay are just minutes away. Spend adventurous days in search of your favorite stretch of beach along Providenciales’ endless coastline. Golf and tennis can be found just a couple miles down the road, and it’s a short 8 mile drive to the airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Casa Mañana is a gorgeous beachfront gem with five king bedroom suites, situated directly on Palmilla Beach in the Los Cabos Corridor. Built largely of beautiful stone and garlanded with lush flowering vines, the villa enjoys panoramic views of the Sea of Cortez from its ample terraces and luminous interiors. High-end amenities include a swimming pool, hot tub, and gourmet kitchen. Your vacation rental comes with daily housekeeping and continental breakfast, while additional services and activities are available at extra cost. Palmilla Golf Club is just one kilometer away.The home is designed in exquisite harmony with the landscape and sea, inviting you to savor the open-air pleasures of Baja Sur. An ample swimming pool runs along the side of the house, with a hot tub perched at the beachfront end—the perfect theater for admiring the sparkling sea or starry sky. Lovely parasols cast gentle shade over stylish lounge chairs, while the spacious veranda offers a cool retreat for alfresco meals and home-made cocktails.Wide glass doors inhale the sea-kissed air into the home, creating a seamless flow between the veranda and open-concept interior. This airy, luminous space features a beautiful wood dining table for ten and a lounge with TV and fireplace. The superbly equipped kitchen includes window bars on two sides, easily serving both dining tables. A large, separate media room offers a lovely escape for afternoon downtime or late-night movies, with glass doors opening to an ocean-view balcony. Throughout the villa, cream-toned walls complement the rustic masonry, fine wood accents, and subtle touches of artful flair.The stunning master suite features a king bed, lounge with fireplace, and ensuite bathroom. Beachfront balconies extend from both the bedroom and bathroom, offering effortless access to the soft sands and welcoming sea. Three of the guest suites are essentially junior master suites: each has a king bed, ocean view, a terrace or balcony, and a deluxe ensuite bathroom. The fifth bedroom features a king bed and access to a hallway bathroom.From this prime location, you're just seven kilometers from the bohemian-chic charm and colonial beauty of San José del Cabo, and ten kilometers from Costa Azul. Golfers are minutes from Palmilla Golf Club and a short drive from Querencia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
